name: Spellbook
description: A leather-bound tome with 100 blank vellum pages suitable for recording spells. Essential for wizards and other spellcasters who prepare spells from written sources. The book has brass fittings and a clasp.
ai_description: Leather tome with brass clasp, arcane symbols, and blank pages
notes: when equipped, should add a d3 to spell damages, maybe other bonuses
